statements: UPDATE sales_performance SET quantity_sold = 10, total_revenue = 1000 WHERE sale_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE sales_performance SET total_revenue = 1500, product_id = 101, quantity_sold = 15 WHERE sale_id = '98765432-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-1234567890ab';
UPDATE sales_performance SET total_revenue = total_revenue * 1.1 WHERE sale_id = 'abcdef1234567890';
UPDATE sales_performance SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 5, total_revenue = total_revenue + 50.75 WHERE product_id = 1001;
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = 1500.50, salesperson_id = 101 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sales_report SET sales_year = 2022, sale_amount = 2000.75 WHERE report_id = 5;
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = 1500.50, sale_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE id = 101
UPDATE sales_report SET sale_amount = 2500.75, sales_year = 2022 WHERE salesperson_id = 201
UPDATE SalesPerformance SET sales_amount = 1500 WHERE sale_id = 100
UPDATE SalesTargets SET target_amount = 2000, target_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE target_id = 50
UPDATE SalesPerformance SET sales_amount = sales_amount + 5000 WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
UPDATE SalesTargets SET target_amount = 15000, target_date = '2022-03-01' WHERE sales_rep_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE sales_team SET manager_id = 100 WHERE team_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_rep SET hire_date = '2022-01-15', commission_rate = 0.10 WHERE rep_id = 101;
UPDATE sales_rep SET commission_rate = 0.08 WHERE rep_id = 101
UPDATE sales_team SET manager_id = 201 WHERE team_id = 10
UPDATE SalesPerformance SET total_sales = total_sales + 1000 WHERE sale_id = 1;
UPDATE Employees SET department = 'HR' WHERE employee_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE SalesPerformance SET total_sales = total_sales + 500 WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE Employees SET department = 'Marketing', hire_date = '2023-02-10' WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
